name: 操舵技术
description: 如果燃料混合比到位，引擎就会哼起小曲，就像...}嗯哼...}一切都浑然天成，从群星直直地渗到你的骨髓里。换句话说，就像那种饱睡一觉的感觉，哈...}言语无法形容这种神韵。
author: Nachiketa 港区采访项目，第三集

name: 战斗耐力
description:
通过灾难，十四军团得以成长。
通过霸主，人之领得以延续。
通过责任，人性得以永存。
author: Kali Molina 海军上将 - [霸主宣言] c49

name: 冲击缓解
description: 舰船的机动导致了斜向冲击角度的产生，并将弹体冲击力完全分散到泡沫金属层中。不幸的是，因为产生震荡的时机过于刁钻，船员{York}在日常运输重型机械的过程中发生了悲剧。
author: 关于发生于 c120.03.08 的 Thule 小规模冲突，海军都统 Zhou 提交的行动后检视报告

name: 损伤管制
description: 从}Kazeron}的伟大锻炉中诞生，这艘船无疑是同类中的翘楚。我们应该珍惜这份礼物，只因其立于我们的家园和那些将要终结我们的生活方式的人之间。
author: 海军都统 Tethys 于 PLS Astelene Key 出航仪式的讲话

name: 相场调制
description: 很少有人具有我认为的}"主动调音"}的天赋。我发现音乐家才是最好的外勤人员。
author: Ardis Soloman，将泄露的数据提交给 COMSEC 的修订算法时

name: 点防专精
description: 我？我对那种什么激光可不感冒。是，乱七八糟的灯光秀是很好看啊，但没什么能比火神炮阵列的贫铀弹之壁更能阻挡那些飞过来的}"小亮点"}了。
author: "下层甲板的英雄"，连载于霸主通讯

name: 目标解析
description: 机械协助下的人脑有能力在冲突的传感器数据和矛盾的战术指导中分析出有效方案，目标定位计算机永远无法独立代替一位战士。
author: "太空战斗，第二十二卷 卷末"，来自 人之领第十四军团图书馆

name: 实弹大师
description:
是什么阻止了速子的阴谋? (大炮!)
是什么被老卢德忘在脑后? (大炮!)
是什么我们有而他们没有? (更大，更大，更大的大炮!)
author: 霸主海军的酒醉歌

name: 系统专精
description: 不，我不觉得有什么矛盾的，这是一...}额...}一场灵魂之旅，你在接受考验。不过就像那句话说的，恶魔就藏在细节之中。
author: "卢德士卒" 全息档案，对左径工程师的采访部分

name: 导弹特化
description: 我的同事们不喜欢他们的鬼点子}——}就像你带着这些太空船，然后你无视一切准则仅仅就因为它们不必存活到降落。
author: 前军械设计师 K.Astraia 于 Culann 星际锻炉发表的离职面谈

name: 战术演习
description:
完美。
现在再来一次。
author: Cameron Fourth-Phobos 附近，Coatl 射击场

name: 协调机动
description: 长官，来袭的敌舰正在全速前进，有一艘}——}两艘，不，三艘，还在增加...}他们数量太多了！高能读数确认，六秒后接敌。
author: HSS Ceraon 号最高司令官的音频档案，恢复于 189.09.13

name: 狼群战术
description: 只会摆出那些坐在桌前的高级军官喜欢阵型的舰队，不过是被驯化的待宰羔羊罢了。与猎犬划清界限，我们才能再次成为狼。
author: 军阀 Kanta 引用于 "我当海盗女王的一年"

name: 船员训练
description: 我懂你们这群人是什么样的，刚签合约的时候靴子上甚至还满是泥巴，现在倒是一个个都准备好当太空人了？霸主的战争宣传片看太多了是吧？给我记好了：蛮勇不值得鼓励，好的船员就该踏实完成工作，逞英雄只会害得我们全部没命。
author: Chaiya Mimas 于速子分舰队入职培训介绍会上的讲话

name: 战机传讯
description: 那些开战机的老粗总是吹嘘着他们的传奇，但他们只不过是我手中长矛的矛尖罢了。
author: 霸主海军 Jensulte 准将于 c82

name: 航母集群
description: 统计数据告诉我们他们会在完成半打任务之前就在防空炮的弹幕中被蒸发，但是我们还是想成为他们中的一员。当他们坐在驾驶舱里的时候，他们是整个舰队里唯一将命运完全握在自己手中的人。
author: Nachiketa 港区采访项目，第四集

name: 军官训练
description: 他们或许是一群放不上台面的佣兵、走私犯、海盗，但如果你给予他们值得为之而战的事物，那我认为他们一定能还你一个惊喜。
author: 海军都统 Nurul Park 对于 Cibolan 海军整合后的评论

name: 军官管理
description: 战斗前景很残酷，所以我向佣兵船长们许诺了两倍的奖金。在经历伤亡后我只需要给活下来的一半人结算，一切都是算好的。
author: Carson Kang，速子科技 Valhalla 分舰队主管

name: 万里挑一
description: Artemisia，我们所拥有的，是那些你没法买到的东西。
author: Orcus Rao，在结束第二次 AI 战争的谈判中 (未证实)

name: 辅助学说
description: 不是每个学员都拥有出色的天赋或技能，甚至其两个脑细胞都很难揉在一起，但通过磨练与辐射，他们终将在秩序与纪律下毕业。
author: 未署名的评论者，出自 Coatl 学院职员，COMSEC 档案馆

name: 力量集中
description: 当我在我选择的时间和地点取得胜利时，历史将免除我牺牲一两个星球的责任。
author: 海军上将 Andrada，给霸主执行委员会的致辞

name: 精准导航
description: 只要在上面花了足够的时间，这就能成为你的第二本能。我做梦的时候都能掌舵。虽然不是所有人都能像这样，但大部分都行。
author: Nachiketa 港区采访项目，第二集

name: 传感探测
description: 我看见你了，小鱼儿!
author: ISS Green Flash 号的通讯缓存，恢复于 Beta Zuma B 的轨道上

name: 火控植入
description: 长时间后人可能会难以区分一般的感官感觉和经过植入物调整的现实，心理健康保全员应该基于以下标准周期性地检查炮手是否患有植入物解离性障碍...}
author: 一个新的领导力框架：霸主军官手册

name: 能量大师
description: 天使之眼被发现于微不足道之地，上帝在创世时就将其藏于斯，由此其秘为无知及残酷者所揭，放出可怖及炙热之怒。我们哀叹
author: 卢德圣典

name: 电子对抗
description:
错误. 401 // 连接被拒绝 [是否重试？]
错误. 401 // 连接被拒绝 [是否重试？]
错误. 401 // 连接被拒绝 [是否重试？]
author: Celadon Immeasurable，阿尔法

name: 幅能调节
description: 警告：通过改变这些设置，用户将视为放弃速子科技对因此造成的设备损伤、人员受伤、人员死亡或其它未知后果的所有责任。您仍要继续吗？
author: 速子科技 标准证书

name: 模控增强
description: 不要听信伦理委员会里那些哭闹的卢德份子的话。它的排斥率可远远不及传言所暗示的那样严重。
author: Wyatt Cydonia "博士" (化名)，COMSEC 拦截员

name: 相位兵团
description: 速子科技每天都在试图撬开神圣的造物，每一次的亵渎都带来了对全人类的诅咒。我们的道路是艰险的。我们的道路是痛苦的。我们应该以信仰为凭对抗他们，只因救赎存于末日审判之中。
author: 卢德左径恐怖分子 Livewell Cotton 于 c205.2.12 的布道

name: 特殊改装
description: 那些人之领设计师？噢，他们的设计确实百世流传，当然没错。但看看那些舒适化设计，你就知道那些设计师可不太敢把它们的性能推到极限。
author: 独立工程师 Luna Hexagen 于 Agreus city

name: 神经链接
description: 为什么舰长必须要和他们的舰船一起沉没？速子科技公司从不会浪费顶级人才。
author: 运营副总裁 Nereid De Jong 在 "赫克特项目" 揭幕仪式上的致辞

name: 无人战舰
description: [数据删除]
author: 霸主通信安全协议

name: 大宗物流
description: 就像不能摆脱引力一样，人无法摆脱经济。经济包围着我们，容纳着我们。经济曾将银河联系在一起，也会再度如此。
author: Artemisia Sun 于 c203 年度汇报

name: 打捞作业
description:
这让我感觉自己非常渺小，就像是在失落神使的城市里搜刮的虫豸一样。
但这也使我富有。
author: Zion Hurst，Asher 打捞工会的熟练工

name: 现场维修
description: 20光年内没有一艘船的船体不印着海盗标志。能带我们脱离此地的只有我们自己的技术，以及那片残骸场里能找到的任何东西。
author: Callisto Ibrahim，探索日志 c202.10.15

name: 军械专家
description: 弱者只会畏惧杀戮机器的力量，而强者则会本能地认识到它的美丽。
author: 最高行政官语录

name: 极化装甲
description: 您知道吗?}"大崩塌"}前的手册说过永远不要这么做...}不，我不知道。但据我所知，到目前为止还没有遇到任何问题。
author: 工程主管 Kasi Thea-Radiative，出自隐蔽式全息采访

name: 密闭流程
description: 封口查三遍，死神不来见。
author: 太空舰长俗语

name: 临时设备
description: 我们好像把备用的丢在轨道了，不过没事...}(滋滋声)...}看好了啊}——
author: "H" 探索小队的领袖 Jericho Wheeler 的音频备份转录

name: 工业规划
description: 一个荒芜但具有潜力的星球，位置便于成为}Magec}的文化和工业中心，我们的模型预计在开发}Guayota}行星环的资源上将需要大量投资。
author: 速子科技策略发展备忘录，"大崩塌" 前

name: 废船舰队
description: 那些漂亮星舰里的高管和提督们觉得我们是一堆垃圾，一旦战局不妙就会抛下我们。既然这片星区是我们建立起来的，那我们也有资格将它毁灭。
author: 不知名的海盗煽动者，出自霸主情报部监视报告

name: 船体修复
description: 没有什么破烂船体能阻止一名真正的太空船员回家。
author: Sol Secondshift，资深打捞员

name: 极化认知
description:
一台拥有无限可能的机器可将每一份数据，每个人的想法以组合再组和的方式合成出无数的变体。只需提问，就可得到合适答案。 
然而，我发现自己并不满足于被愚弄的证明了一个如此宏大的命题。
author: "通往 Gilead 的漫长之路" 作者: 匿名

id: # removed in 0.95.1a, but kept around for save compatibility

name: Space Operations
description: The same stars are seen in the sky of every world.
author: Persean League founding charter

name: Ground Operations
description:
The mud? I don't mind it. Spacers always carry on about mud.
It's the blood I can't stand.
author: Griffin Sweet, mercenary marine

name: Colony Management
description: Where there is life, that is the throne of God, and all that is good can be found there.
author: Sacred Texts of Ludd

name: Strike Commander
description: You will fly and it will be a storm like they've never known. You are a thunderbolt come to split the sky itself!
author: Navarch Mars Kato, address to the bomber crews of the Sirocco

name: Ranged Specialization
description: See this firing solution? It'll make the defensive algorithms overreact at just the wrong time. The catch is, they've got to see it coming.
author: CPO Cameron Fourth-Phobos, instructor posted to Coatl Gunnery Range

name: Shield Modulation
description: Few have a talent for what I like to think of as 'active tuning'. I find musicians make the best shield officers.
author: Ardis Soloman, leaked data submitted to COMSEC redaction algorithm

name: Phase Mastery
description: I'm not getting back on that ship, not never.
author: Court martial log, [REDACTED], dated ~c196?

name: Reliability Engineering
description: In the end, by time and rads, my body will die. My comrades will return me to the stars that made me, and my ship will go on.
author: Spacer tradition

name: Weapon Drills
description:
What's it stopped the Tri-Tach plot? (Guns!)
What was it ol' Ludd forgot? (Guns!)
What’ve we got that they have not? (Big, big, guns!)
author: drinking song of the Hegemony navy

name: Auxiliary Support
description: No reserves? Look around you! There are a thousand space-capable ships in the civilian docks and a billion citizens in the arcologies. We need only open the stockpiles and give them weapons before the invasion arrives.
author: Baikal Daud at the Defense of Chicomoztoc

name: Combat Endurance
description: Through experience and planning, a seasoned officer has the ability to extend the effective warfighting time of ship and crew during the extreme conditions of combat deployment.
author: Lorem Ipsum

name: Ordnance Expertise
description: A detailed knowledge of the operational characteristics and maintenance protocols of armaments can be applied to achieve increased combat performance.
author: Lorem Ipsum

name: Defensive Systems
description: Extensive knowledge of the interactions between the ship's power grid and its defensive systems can produce qualitative improvements in operational characteristics.
author: Lorem Ipsum

name: Advanced Countermeasures
description: Attention to detail and regular maintenance can allow the various defensive systems of a hull to excel in their role.
author: Lorem Ipsum

name: Evasive Action
description: Even if incoming fire cannot be completely avoided, the pilot often has a choice in just where the damage is taken, which can result in reduced damage impact.
author: Lorem Ipsum

name: Command & Control
description: Hard-won experience - as well as poring over tactical manuals and battle reports - allow the commander to formulate and carry out more advanced battle plans.
author: Lorem Ipsum

name: Fighter Doctrine
description: Carriers and fighter wings have a very different set of requirements from regular ships, and an experienced fleet commander can make a critical difference by providing proper support.
author: Lorem Ipsum

name: Carrier Command
description: Fighter wings and their crews have very specialized requirements, and an experienced captain can make a critical difference by providing proper support.
author: Lorem Ipsum

name: Wing Commander
description: Rigorous training drills, select personnel, and camaraderie forged through hardship can turn a rag-tag bunch of fighter pilots into an efficient, elite-level force.
author: Lorem Ipsum

name: Power Grid Modulation
description: Preventive maintenance and some inspired on-the-fly adjustments can greatly increase the capacity of the ship's power grid.
author: Lorem Ipsum

name: Loadout Design
description: The baseline specifications for ship loadouts are notoriously conservative, and an experienced engineer can push them well above their stated limits.
author: Lorem Ipsum

name: Fleet Logistics
description: Making sure supplies and other materiel get where they need to be is not a glorious task. It is, however, critical - both in dealing with emergencies and ensuring smooth day-to-day operations.
author: Lorem Ipsum

name: Recovery Operations
description: Extracting working equipment or even useful replacement parts out of wreckage requires broad technical knowledge, prudence, and a willingness to take calculated risks.
author: Lorem Ipsum

name: Safety Procedures
description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
author: Lorem Ipsum
